name: Malaysian Coconut Curry Soup
description: A warming, flavourful, one-dish-dinner Malaysian soup.

ingredients.name: thinly sliced Chinese greens (bok choy, Chinese cabbage or Chinese broccoli)

preparation: Combine broth, coconut milk and kaffir lime leaves in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil, reduce temperature to medium and simmer for 5 minutes.
Combine curry powder and tomato paste in a small mixing bowl. Add to soup along with carrots. Simmer for 3 minutes.
Season to taste with soy sauce. Discard kaffir lime leaves.
Stir in onion and Chinese greens and serve immediately.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: For a heartier dinner, stir in leftover cooked chicken, pork, fish or other seafood.
